## Marker.getCurNode() method

Gets the current location of the marker.  The current field, connection, or block the marker is on.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCurNode(): ASTNode;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[ASTNode](./blockly.astnode.md)
